content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Respond to parts a, b, and c.Identify ONE cultural development in Europe in the sixteenth century that contributed to the global spread of Christianity in the period circa 1500–1750.Explain how ONE economic development facilitated the global spread of Christianity in the period circa 1500–1750.Explain how ONE factor limited the global spread of Christianity in the period circa 1500–1750.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
